```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(data.table)
library(lubridate)

```


```{r}

meteorite_landings <- read.csv('meteorite-landings.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
meteorite_landings$reclat <- round(meteorite_landings$reclat, digits = 4)
meteorite_landings$reclong <- round(meteorite_landings$reclong, digits = 4)

meteorite_landings$lat_lng <- mapply(
  function(x, y){
    paste(x,y, sep = ",")
  }, 
  meteorite_landings$reclat, 
  meteorite_landings$reclong
  ) 



meteorite_landings_country <- read.csv('country_name_final_migrate.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
#meteorite_landings_country$X <- NULL

meteorite_landings_country$lat_lng <- mapply(
  function(x, y){
    paste(x,y, sep = ",")
  }, 
  meteorite_landings_country$latitude, 
  meteorite_landings_country$longitude
  ) 



```


```{r}

meteorite_landings

meteorite_landings_country

merged_data <- left_join(meteorite_landings, meteorite_landings_country, by = "lat_lng")

names(merged_data)

merged_data[c(2,1,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10,11,15,16,13,14,17,18)]



```

```{r}


# https://www.statmethods.net/management/merging.html
merge(meteorite_landings_country,meteorite_landings,by=c("lat_lng"))


```
